question: The spiritual guru Gadadhar Chattopadhyay is best known with which among the following names ?
explanation: Sri Ramakrishna Paramahansa Dev (Gadadhar Chattopadhyaya) was an Indian Hindu mystic, saint, and religious leader of Bengal. He was born on 18 February 1836. He was a priest at the Dakshineshwar Kali Temple which was build by Rani Rashmoni in 1855.
